pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: to hit (the mark)/to be hit by/to suffer/to win (a prize, a lottery)

public/collectively owned/common/international (e.g. high seas, metric system, calendar)/make public/fair/just/Duke, highest of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/honorable (gentlemen)/father-in-law/male (animal)
to take charge of/to manage/department (under a ministry)

sentences.english: This is Air China cabin crew chief, director of the voice of Kai-Yan.
sentences.chinese: 这是中国国际航空公司客舱部主任乘务长阎开的心声。

sentences.english: Roundtrip Economy class air ticket for Hong Kong and Beijing on AC.
sentences.chinese: 中国国际航空公司来回香港至北京经济客位机票。

sentences.english: We settled into coach on an Air China non-stop flight to Frankfurt, and I opened a Chinese packet of “Outbound Group Advice, ” which we’d been urged to read carefully.
sentences.chinese: 我们上了一架中国国际航空公司直飞法兰克福的班机。

pinyin: Zhong1 guo2 Dong1 fang1 Hang2 kong1
Zhong1 guo2 Lian2 he2 Hang2 kong1

definition: Air China (abbr. for 中國國際航空公司|中国国际航空公司[Zhong1 guo2 Guo2 ji4 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1])
China United Airlines, abbr. for 中國聯合航空|中国联合航空[Zhong1 guo2 Lian2 he2 Hang2 kong1]
Hong Kong Dragon Airlines (operating as Dragonair), Hong Kong-based international airline

pinyin: Fa3 guo2 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1
He2 lan2 Huang2 jia1 Hang2 kong1
De2 guo2 Han4 sha1 Hang2 kong1 Gong1 si1

definition: (of an airline) to run a flight
Korean Air, South Korea's main airline
scheduled flight/flight number/plane/scheduled sailing/sailing number/passenger ship
